summary: Accolade is a templar sword, craftable, upgradeable and made from scratch, includes 4k and 2k textures.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][size=6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67991/]--- NEW VERSION AVAILABLE HERE ---[/url][/size]

[size=4]As all my mods, it's FREE and NEXUS-EXCLUSIVE, if you see it on Steam it's stolen.[/size][/b][/u]
Accolade is a templar sword, it's craftable under steel category (you need the steel smithing perk), you need steel ingots, leather and leather strips, nothing hard to find. It's also upgradeable at a grindstone. Stats are similar to dwarven sword.
Made from scratch with custom sheath, includes 4k and 2k textures for both sword and sheath and high quality cubemap.
It is compatible out of the box with dual sheath mods.

For instalation i recommed using NMM, but if you want to install it manually just drop the two files (.esp and .bsa) in Data folder and activate the esp in the launcher or whatever you use.
To unistall it, if you installed manually delete the two files.

Feel free to upload your shots, and thanks a lot in advance as mines are not very good.

And i think that's all, ask any question you want in comments, i'll read them. Hope you like it.

Videos by Ruiuji,ChaosUnheard and sidras01, thanks guys :)
